name: Phaeria's Mine
description:
Phaeria was a poor, desolate kingdom, until one day when an enormous gold deposit was found underneath its castle.

This sudden discovery was surely welcomed. The new gold mine will surely change the fate of Phaeria, but for better or worse?

Phaeria's Mine is a Tower Defense/ Management game in which you perform the role of Phaeria's ruler. Developing this poor kingdom by making the best out of its limited resource while defending from invaders.

Featuring:

  • A game of balance and growth: All rulers want the best for their country. But in order to do so, one must find the balance between riches and security for their people.
  • "Romance of the 7 kingdoms": Hand-crafted lands diverse in sceneries and cultures. Discover the intertwining relationship between the kingdoms and search for secrets to bring prosperity to Phaeria!
  • Self-paced challenges: you are the ruler that Phaeria deserve.

Phaeria's Mine is currently in development for Windows & OSX.

Join us on Discord!We post WIP stuffs, beta releases, and discuss ideas for future development.

This game was originally our entry for Ludum Dare 40 game jam. The theme was: "The more you have, the worse it is".
